titleStmt.title: The benediction From the A:lmighty O:mnipotent.
titleStmt.author: Eleanor, Lady, d. 1652.

notesStmt.note: Addressed to Oliver Cromwell. Bible verse on title page reads: I have an errand to thee O:Captain.
Identified as Wing D1977 (entry cancelled in Wing 2nd ed.) on UMI microfilm "Early English books, 1641-1700".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
